languages.text: "Мейв, принеси мне кубок {g|Encyclopedia:Amasec}амасека{/g}. И чтобы был наполнен до краев",{n} — внезапно распоряжается Арбитес.{/n}

traits.locale_text: "Лидзи, принеси мне кубок амасека. И чтобы был наполнен до краев",{n} — внезапно распоряжается Арбитес.{/n}

languages.text: "Maive, bring me a cup of {g|Encyclopedia:Amasec}amasec{/g} — and make sure it's filled to the brim," {n}comes an unexpected order from Solomorne.{/n}

languages.text: "Maive, bringt mir einen Becher {g|Encyclopedia:Amasec}Amasec{/g}, und füllt ihn bis zum Rand"{n}, ertönt ein unerwarteter Befehl von Solomorne.{/n}

traits.locale_text: "Maive, bringt mir einen Becher Amasec, und füllt ihn bis zum Rand"{n}, ertönt ein unerwarteter Befehl von Solomorne.{/n}

languages.text: « Maive, apportez-moi une coupe d'{g|Encyclopedia:Amasec}amasec{/g}, en veillant à ce qu'elle soit remplie à ras bord, » {n}ordonne Solomorne à votre grande surprise.{/n}
languages.original_text: "Maive, bring me a cup of {g|Encyclopedia:Amasec}amasec{/g} — and make sure it's filled to the brim," {n}comes an unexpected order from Solomorne.{/n}

traits.locale_text: « Maive, apportez-moi une coupe d'amasec, en veillant à ce qu'elle soit remplie à ras bord, » {n}ordonne Solomorne à votre grande surprise.{/n}

languages.text: 「メイヴ、{g|Encyclopedia:Amasec}アマセック{/g}を一杯持ってこい、なみなみと注げ」{n}ソロモーンから思いがけない命令が飛んだ。{/n}
languages.original_text: "Maive, bring me a cup of {g|Encyclopedia:Amasec}amasec{/g} — and make sure it's filled to the brim," {n}comes an unexpected order from Solomorne.{/n}

traits.locale_text: 「メイヴ、アマセックを一杯持ってこい、なみなみと注げ」{n}ソロモーンから思いがけない命令が飛んだ。{/n}

languages.text: «Maive, traiga una copa de {g|Encyclopedia:Amasec}amasec{/g}. Y que esté llena hasta el borde». {n}Solomorne da una orden sorprendente.{/n}
languages.original_text: "Maive, bring me a cup of {g|Encyclopedia:Amasec}amasec{/g} — and make sure it's filled to the brim," {n}comes an unexpected order from Solomorne.{/n}

traits.locale_text: «Maive, traiga una copa de amasec. Y que esté llena hasta el borde». {n}Solomorne da una orden sorprendente.{/n}

languages.text: “梅芙，给我倒杯{g|Encyclopedia:Amasec}艾玛赛克酒{/g}，记得要倒得满满当当。”{n}索罗蒙出人意料地点了杯酒。{/n}
languages.original_text: "Maive, bring me a cup of {g|Encyclopedia:Amasec}amasec{/g} — and make sure it's filled to the brim," {n}comes an unexpected order from Solomorne.{/n}

languages.text: "Maive, bana bir kadeh {g|Encyclopedia:Amasec}amasek{/g} ver. Ağzına kadar doldur." {n}Solomorne, beklenmedik bir sipariş veriyor.{/n}

traits.locale_text: "Maive, bana bir kadeh amasek ver, ağzına kadar doldur ama," {n}diye beklenmedik bir sipariş veriyor Solomorne.{/n}
